attributes.background: Government should ban online fast fashion hauls as they’re destroying the planet. The hauls result in overconsumption as influencers buy large quantities from clothing companies to discuss them on social media. Most of these clothes end up in a landfill once the items are no longer “in fashion”.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about posting videos of clothing online are a matter for individuals and online hosting services, not the UK Government or Parliament.
